title: Poll: Do you think colleges should close in the face of an online threat like the one the FBI warned of Sunday?
text:
Published By: Delaware Online - Yesterday 
Poll: Do you think colleges and universities should close for the day in the face of an online threat like the one the FBI warned of Sunday?...
